EstablishmentCollection.RightToReply:
<p>
	<span style="font-size: 14pt; line-height: 120%; font-family: Roboto; color: rgb(32, 33, 36); letter-spacing: 0.1pt; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">&quot;All concerns - including the requirement for us to fill in form SFBB(25) rather than SFBB(24) - were rectified within a matter of hours of this visit. We have since had a re-visit that confirmed all works to an out building had been completed and all other minor issues resolved. The officer confirmed that we would now get a higher score in line with previous results. Unfortunately, we understand the new score can not be applied for 3 months, despite being at the higher standard.&quot;</span></p>
